message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a remarkable value at its regular price of $80. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $75. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly special. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
